values:
I feel like everything in my life is going the right way.





and i'm happy.

It's been a while since i have updated this..

I started school volleyball yesterday, ha and let me tell you.. i can't move. GOTTA LOVE VOLLEYBALL. Tonight is our first night of summer league, which is basically school season but it summer to just play to get ready for the next school season, i'm playing on Varsity! =] NV1 wahoo. theres 16 of us so i wont get much playing time. and i really need to shine tonight, but i can barely move... theres only 3 openings on Varsity this year and i my goal is to be one of those spots. 

okay. summer is busy, went to Washington DC/Virginia Beach, got sun poisoning. Busch Gardens was awesome. 
i saw Mitchel Musso on Sunday, he confessed his love to me. 

sigh, i wish that was true.. 

and Frankie Jonas was there, weird.

ha and i love in the last post i said soemthing about someone not introducing me to one guy, ha well since things just went just grand with him anyway. 

alright, Joniz Bruddahs on Thursday, USA Mens volleyball friday and Joniz Bruddahs again saturday.

peaceoutgirlscout.

well, why exactly am I updating?

I couldn't tell you.


3 half days of school.. then SUMMER! YAYAYAYAY.

alright, studying is my new best friend.

peace out.

Well, looks like me updating this definatly did not work out. I just made a ringtone for the first time, i'm so happy! It's No Boundries by Kris Allen! ahhaha 

okay well i do have a lot to say, but i just won't say it.

This week has been alright so far. Over the weekend i had my last volleyball tournament with my team, I am really gunna miss them, i wont get to see them til October at tryouts cuz they all live in different places. This past tournament was a huge tournament, it was the National Junior Classic, which has teams from Michigan, Indiana, Orlando, Kentucky and so on. Competition was hard, and i was playing on a hurt foot. There were so many college scouts i cant even tell you, and it was so embarrassing considering we only won 2 matches out of 6 and each time they were watching we were loosing.. Penn State watched us..HOLY CRAP, PENN STATE. Okay i know u are probably like who cares, but holy crapppp Penn State is the best volleyball team in the nation, omg,. There were plenty of other schools like Wisconsin, LSU, Ballstate. but on the plus side in Indy i played the best volleyball of my life, and there were scouts watching! YAYAYAY! if only i was smart enough... well i truly am sad that season is over, this was the best club season i have had and i finally found a team i love, cant wait for next yearrr!
On Sunday we went to Mongolian after and omg HOTT CHEF, me and Em stalked him... lmao lmao. we were talking to him like the whole time, he didnt care we were flirting, he was awesome, and he of course has the name Ryan, i mean who doesnt.... hahah OH AND JULIET OUR WAITER WAS AWESOME.

okay enough rambling about volleyball. 

now since i am done and have been in terrible pain the past couple of weeks, i am, yes once again, in a boot. Last year i was in it 2 times, this year once. the one thing i hate about it is the fact its noticeable and everyoneeeeee i mean EVERYONE, even people idk ask me what happened. its hard to explain.. for the short end of it, my joints are popping in and out of my foot and i cant put pressure on one side. oh and walking up and down the stairs sucks butt and if one more person trips me in the hall... LKJSDFLKDSLKFJS. yeah okay. my spanish teacher flipped out today and made me put it up... it was embarrassing. 
okay so this is really long.

i'm still going.
well i havent talked to much people lately, and its not really what i expected but i just live with it i guess... theres only so much you can do. I am getting really close to my family, i jsut learn to always be close to them because they will always be there for you no matter what. I really do miss all my friends, not just my recent ones but everytime i pass my old friends in the hall it upsets me, thats not a lie... my best friend since 2nd grade wont even say hi to me in the hall when i say hi to her...we never got in a fight, she just wont talk to me. it upsets me. oh and some people have been pissing me off... like when people only want every guy to like you and wont introduce me to ONE GUY, one freaken guy.. seriously! i am so pissed... ugh frustrating. i give up, well idk but yeah.

this is long, and quite pointless and i know only Tracie will read this.

OH and Paranoid... LOVE THE VIDEO, HOLY CRAPPPPPPPPPPPPP best freaken video ever, and a fantastic song.

and i still go by my word JB "Once a fan, always a fan."
i'm not giving up.

alala okay so i am super tired, i have been lately which is weird considering i have no volleyball.

OH AND I HATE MY DOCTOR, i still have to swim and today i had to swim 2 snakes, which is theres 8 lanes, swim down one climb out swim down the other, etc.  through all 8 then do it again.
I almost started crying from the pain,  i went to the doctor to get a note after school, wont freaking give me one.

ya okay im done rambling, school tomorrow, gay. 
theres like what, 8 days left?
yay almost summer...
yay for concerts.
peace out girl scout.

Alright, i honestly doubt anyone has one of these anymore.. but hey i will just write. This is my first time coming on here since 2006. When i just went through and read all my posts.. i can't even believe it. seriously.. the last time i was on here was in 7th grade.. i'm soooooo different now. I can't even believe i talked about the person who i liked at the time, who i absolutely hate now.. hahaha anyway.. my friends are definatly different now then how they were then.. but i really do miss those people...

i'll write more later..
off to school!

wow. i havnt been on this in forever. well 2006 is almost over. and wow it has definatly been the best year of my life.. i went to another jesse mccartney concert. no suprise hahaa i loved it =D i met my 2 best friends. Alison and Mackenzie. we spent a lot of time together in the summer and it was sooooooo much fun. im so glad i met them. i went to a chicago fire soccer game with Marci and Taylor Thompson and it was AMAZING. i saw a TON of concerts this year. Keith Urban, Jesse McCartney, Lianne Rymes, The Jonas Brothers [ashley parker angel but i missed him but i saw him doing meet and greet] Lonestar and i think thats it idk if Kenny Chesney was this year. but anyway. The Jonas Brothers concert was definatlyone of my favorites other then JESSE of course!!! I TOUCHED JOE JONAS'S HAND!! OMG IT WAS FRICKEN AMAZING and i got a jesse mccartney autograph!!! =DDDDDDDDDDD <3!!! MY LOVE!! 6th row baby!! my best friends FOREVER :::: =] so that pretty much tells u about 2006. 2007 should be a good year. and im starting it off with seeing WICKED!!! WAHOO!! -Megan!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

at basketball on friday i fell on my ankle. it kills really bad. i cant walk on it and im on crutches.i also hit a metal bar when i fell.

im going to the doctor and or hospital today at 3. 

:/ i dont want to be on crutches at school.

bye.

yep.

wow this year just goes bye fast. drama.

summer was amazing. i mean other then staying home most of the time. i love jesse. and when i went to his concert my life changed. it was just the one thing i have always dreamed of. but why couldnt i have met him? well anyways. school started. i liked the same person since 6th grade. which was adam. people told him. and everything changed. i hated it thats why i cant trust friends. cuz ur suppose to trust friends. but ya. i dont like him anymore. he hates me cuz he thinks i still like him . and when i liked him i wanted to go to his halloween partee so bad everyone new i wanted to and he said i wasnt invited which i was and he said im 'OBSESSED' with him. ew no. life went on. i was on the Scullen Volleyball team. the best experience in my life. i met new friends and had a good relationship but the season ended. soccer for wheatland athletics came.... of course that was amazing cuz i met some of my closest friends like nikki. and em. the coolest 6th graders anyone could ever possibly no. i love soccer season cuz they mean alot to me. there so awesome and funny. i dont no what i would do with out them. then i tried out for Scullen Basketball. i made it which im so mad. cuz  i hate it . it totally sucks. i hate it seriously. i cant quit cuz i made a commitment. theres a tun of running which i hate. :(  im on single a .... then i tried out for volleyball for the ymca. which of course i made (-= but i dont no anyone on my team. which sucks. but o well i love the sport with all my heart. im on wheatland athletics basketball with all my soccer buds LIKE NIKKI AND EM! im so happy and with marci and mel tay molly. :) christmas was fun i guess . i love spending time with my family cuz there so funny. expesially my brother John... hehe my sister got her liscence... (-= today was just amazing . i went to jazmines birthday partee shes 13.. we went laser tagging... man it was so fun! one day i wont forget..its snowing alot today.. i went to anderson's book store to get an autographed book by louis sachar he is the person by the movie HOLES he came out with a new book . which im gunna read. i got all american rejects cd i love it !!! Drake Bell was in a car accident around new years. he has a fractured neck.broken jaw and lines of stitches on his face... hhe is home tho...

thank you to all my friends i dont no what i would do without u guys. i love u all (-=

xoxox Meg xoxo

been really sad latley... cuz of drake.

bye
